skillTree.name: Tolerance to Toxins
skillTree.description: Regular consumption of rotten meat and toxins are the staples of a healthy Ogre diet.

skillTree.name: Grand Slaughterer
skillTree.description: The best part of such rampant slaughter is the gory feast that follows.

skillTree.name: Horrific Stench
skillTree.description: The reeking odour seeping from this one's every pore would offend any creature with a nose, and several without.

skillTree.name: Lucky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Blessed by the Great Maw
skillTree.description: Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Ice Shard
skillTree.description: A mighty spike of the hardest ice blasts forth to impale ranks of enemies like a well-aimed cannonball from below.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Frost Trap
skillTree.description: Summoned from the frozen mountains of Haurg's home, ice claws into the flesh of his foe, pinning them in place and sapping their vitality.

skillTree.name: Blast of Winter
skillTree.description: Snow and ice rise from the land, freezing and blinding any and all in their path with an unnatural cold.

skillTree.name: Born of the Mountains
skillTree.description: A champion amongst his kin, Haurg knows the secret calls that bring them down from the mountains where they reside.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for all Yhetee units.
	(all units in army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all Yhetee units.
	(all units in army)

Recruitment cost: -30% for all Yhetee units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Ambush Predators
skillTree.description: Almost invisible when frozen in place, no one suspects the predator's presence until too late.

effects.description:
Enables Vanguard for all Yhetee units.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Touch of Frost
skillTree.description: So in tune with the nature of ice is Haurg that he can share his blessing with those around him. His enemies, of course, call it a curse.

effects.description:
Enables ice attacks.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Ice Maiden's Kiss"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Ice Maiden's Kiss Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Ice Maiden's Kiss Upgraded"

Miscast base chance: -15% for "Frost Blades Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Death Frost"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Death Frost Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Death Frost Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Crystal Sanctuary"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Crystal Sanctuary Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Crystal Sanctuary Upgraded"

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Heart of Winter"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Heart of Winter Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Heart of Winter Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Frost Born
backgroundSkills.description: Haurg Frostmaw has demonstrated the ability to control ice and shape it to his desires, forming powerful spears and sending shards of frost hurtling through the air towards his foes.

effects.description:
Immune to Snow attrition
	(all units in army)

Ability: "Ambush Predator" for all Yhetee units.
	(all units in army)
